text: Teju Lal Chaudhary is a Nepalese politician. He is former state youth and sports minister and current member of the House of Representatives. He was elected in Province No. 2's Saptari-4. He belongs to the Nepalese Congress. ==References== Category:1962 births Category:Living people Category:Nepalese politicians
title: Teju Lal Chaudhary
